original: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanocittasamuṭṭhāno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁cittasamuṭṭhān aṃ ▁kusalaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na no citt asamuṭṭhān o ▁na kusal o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁hetuyā ▁tīṇi ▁pe ▁avigate ▁tīṇi

original: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanocittasamuṭṭhāno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
analyzed: ▁cittasamuṭṭhān aṃ ▁akusal aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na no citt asamuṭṭhān o ▁na akusal o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁hetuyā ▁tīṇi ▁pe ▁avigate ▁tīṇi ▁abyākat amūl aṃ ▁tīṇi yeva ▁paccay avasena
